Anthony Anderson (born August 15, 1970) is an American actor, writer, Game show host, Panelist and Comedian. He has starred in his own sitcom "All About the Andersons", as well as "The Bernie Mac Show" during the fifth and final season.
He is known for his leading roles in television dramas, such as "K-Ville", "The Shield", and "Law & Order". Anderson has also had supporting roles in films, such as "Transformers", "The Departed", ', "Scream 4", and "Kangaroo Jack".
On July 20, 2018, it was revealed that he is being investigated by the Los Angeles Police Department for a sexual assault allegation.
